Product Description: Discover the exquisite taste of White Chef Halloumi Cheese, a glorious addition to your culinary adventures. Weighing in at 250 grams, this semi-hard, unripened and brined cheese hails from the Mediterranean. With a high melting point, it is perfect for grilling or frying, delivering a unique combination of a crunchy exterior and a mouth-wateringly soft interior. Its robust texture and mild salty flavor make it an ideal choice for salads, sandwiches, appetizers, and more. Make your meals exciting with a touch of Mediterranean tradition! How to Use: 1. Slice the Halloumi Cheese into 1/2 inch slabs. 2. Heat a non-stick frying pan over medium heat without oil. 3. Place the cheese slices onto the heated pan. 4. Flip each slice after 2-3 minutes or until golden-brown. 5. Remove from heat and serve this delectable cheese hot, as a standalone dish or in salads, sandwiches, or atop your favorite grilled vegetables. Storage Instructions: 1. Before opening, store the cheese in a cool and dry place. 2. After opening, keep it refrigerated at a temperature between 2°C to 8°C. 3. Try to consume within 3 days after opening for optimal freshness. 4. Always ensure to reseal it in a ziplock bag or airtight container to maintain its moisture and flavor. Ingredients: - Pasteurized Cow's Milk - Non-Animal Rennet - Dairy Cultures - Salt - Mint leaves.

Product Description: Experience the true richness of Mediterranean cuisine with our White Chef Halloumi Cheese. Weighing 250 grams, this semi-hard, unripened cheese boasts a high melting point which makes it perfect for grilling or frying. Its distinctive layered texture and slightly salty flavor sets it apart, making it the perfect addition to your salads, sandwiches, or pasta dishes. Made from a blend of cow, goat, and sheep's milk, the White Chef Halloumi Cheese will surely make your meals more indulgent and delightful. How to Use: - Slice the halloumi cheese to your desired thickness (generally 1/2 inch slices are recommended). - Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. No oil or butter is necessary as halloumi releases oil as it cooks. - Place the slices in the hot pan and cook until golden brown, usually around 2-3 minutes on each side. - Use your cooked halloumi slices to top salads, sandwiches, or even serve along your favorite Mediterranean dishes. Storage Instructions: - Keep the cheese in the fridge immediately after purchasing, ideally in the vegetable crisper drawer for maximum freshness. - Once opened, ensure to store the halloumi cheese in a resealable bag or airtight container in the fridge. - Use the cheese within 5 days once opened to enjoy its freshness and nutritional benefits. - For longer preservation, you can freeze the halloumi cheese. However, remember to thaw it in the fridge for a few hours before using. Ingredients: - Pasteurized Cow's milk - Pasteurized Goat's milk - Pasteurized Sheep's milk - Salt - Non-animal Rennet - Mint leaves

Product Description: Experience the true richness of Mediterranean cuisine with our White Chef Halloumi Cheese. Weighing 250 grams, this semi-hard, unripened cheese boasts a high melting point which makes it perfect for grilling or frying. Its distinctive layered texture and slightly salty flavor sets it apart, making it the perfect addition to your salads, sandwiches, or pasta dishes. Made from a blend of cow, goat, and sheep's milk, the White Chef Halloumi Cheese will surely make your meals more indulgent and delightful. How to Use: - Slice the halloumi cheese to your desired thickness (generally 1/2 inch slices are recommended). - Heat a non-stick pan over medium heat. No oil or butter is necessary as halloumi releases oil as it cooks. - Place the slices in the hot pan and cook until golden brown, usually around 2-3 minutes on each side. - Use your cooked halloumi slices to top salads, sandwiches, or even serve along your favorite Mediterranean dishes. Storage Instructions: - Keep the cheese in the fridge immediately after purchasing, ideally in the vegetable crisper drawer for maximum freshness. - Once opened, ensure to store the halloumi cheese in a resealable bag or airtight container in the fridge. - Use the cheese within 5 days once opened to enjoy its freshness and nutritional benefits. - For longer preservation, you can freeze the halloumi cheese. However, remember to thaw it in the fridge for a few hours before using. Ingredients: - Pasteurized Cow's milk - Pasteurized Goat's milk - Pasteurized Sheep's milk - Salt - Non-animal Rennet - Mint leaves

Product Description for Trento Chocolate: Immerse in the sweet temptation of Trento Chocolate, crafted for connoisseurs who appreciate the finer things in life. Tempt your taste buds with the rich, velvety texture and complex layers of flavors encased in this indulgent treat. Made from premium quality cocoa beans, this chocolate offers an unparalleled sensory experience. A touch of cream enhances its luxurious texture, while a hint of vanilla rounds off its intense flavor profile. Perfect for sharing, celebrating, or simply savoring alone, this is more than a chocolate. It’s a moment to pause, reflect, and indulge. How to Use: - Open the package carefully to avoid breaking the chocolate. - Break off a piece of Trento Chocolate from the bar. - Allow the piece to melt slowly in your mouth for a full flavor experience. - Enjoy the chocolate as is, or pair with your beverage of choice. - Ideal to be used in baking, dessert preparation or homemade chocolate treats. Storage Instructions: - Store the Trento Chocolate in a cool, dry place, ideally between 65 - 68°F. - Avoid exposure to heat and direct sunlight, as this could cause the chocolate to melt or discolor. - Once the package is opened, ensure to wrap the remaining chocolate tightly or store in an airtight container to maintain flavor and texture. - Do not store chocolate in the fridge, as it can lead to condensation, which will affect its texture and flavor. Ingredients: - Premium quality cocoa beans - Cream - Sugar - Vanilla extract - Lecithin (an emulsifier) - Natural and artificial flavors

About Sunwhite: Sunwhite is proudly owned by SunRice in Australia. SunRice is a global food business and one of Australia’s branded food exporters. Sunwhite is one of the world's branded rice food companies, supplying high quality and innovative rice food products in the Middle East. Our proud history dates back to the establishment of a single rice mill in the Riverina region of New South Wales in 1950. Today, SunRice is a vertically integrated business, operating across the entire value chain, including state-of- the-art processing, packing and value adding food plants, as well as an animal feeds division, a dedicated rice research company and a sophisticated local grain storage network. Innovation is the key to our success and our brands are recognized for their superior taste quality. Avoid storing the bottle near heat sources or direct sunlight to maintain its spice level and prevent discoloration.
